quest.name: The Last Voyage
journal: Aranami is not a man accustomed to being kept waiting.
objectives: Search for the missing Confederate recruit.

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: You there─aye, you. Have you seen a bumbling clod of an Au Ra? A new recruit I ordered to patrol the northern edge of Onokoro. He is late in returning.

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: A strange boy he was, quiet and brooding. Reluctant to speak unless spoken to first. Better that than a fool who never holds his tongue, perhaps.

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: Much as I would enjoy dragging him back by the ear, I cannot. Duty compels me to remain. You, on the other hand, have no such obligations...

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: I sent the boy to patrol the region northwest of Heaven–on–High. If he is not there, then I know not where else he could be...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You cast about for the Confederate recruit, and at last spy a young Auri man lurking behind the rocks to the west...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You cast about for the Confederate recruit, but see no one matching his description.

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: If you find my recruit, tell him to return to me at once. I have no shortage of tasks for him.

dialogue.name: NEWCOMER02679
dialogue.text: Who...who are you? You do not look like a womanman of the Confederacy.

dialogue.name: NEWCOMER02679
dialogue.text: ...Forgive me. 'Twas but yesterday we bid farewell to one of our own, and I worried that she might have lost her way.

dialogue.name: NEWCOMER02679
dialogue.text: We laid her to rest in a boat and pushed her out till the current claimed it. For the sea is our home, now and ever after.

dialogue.name: NEWCOMER02679
dialogue.text: But those sent thither with burdened hearts may drift back to shore, it is said...

dialogue.name: NEWCOMER02679
dialogue.text: Out of concern for her comrades, she strove to earn far more than her keep. She hunted rare and deadly game in treacherous waters, and lost her life for it.

dialogue.name: NEWCOMER02679
dialogue.text: But my vigil is ended─her vessel has not returned to Onokoro! She has made peace with this life and placed her faith in us to live on...

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: So, what of my recruit? Did you find him napping on the beach or some such?

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: What? All this time he was standing watch for the funerary vessel? Huh...

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: So rarely does he give voice to his thoughts. I had no idea our comrade's death had affected him so. Too quick was I to judge him.

dialogue.name: ARANAMI
dialogue.text: It is good that you went in my stead, else I might have misspoken and made a fool of myself. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude.
